scenario_1.calculation_notes: Applied 1.15 multiplier for first-time client. Added fees for Schedule A ($50) and Schedule B ($35). Time charge calculated as (2.5 hours * $125/hour * 1.15) - $175 base fee.

scenario_2.calculation_notes: Applied 1.25 multiplier for prior year amendments. Added fees for 3 Schedule K-1s ($225) and Form 4562 ($85). Time charge calculated as (4 hours * $125/hour * 1.25) - $650 base fee.

scenario_3.calculation_notes: Applied 1.44 multiplier (1.20 * 1.20) for two state returns. Added fees for Schedule C ($125), Schedule SE ($40), and Form 8829 ($45). Time charge calculated as (3 hours * $125/hour * 1.44) - $175 base fee.

scenario_4.calculation_notes: Applied 1.35 multiplier for complex asset dispositions. Added fees for 5 Schedule K-1s ($375) and Form 4797 ($95). Time charge calculated as (5.5 hours * $125/hour * 1.35) - $550 base fee.

scenario_5.calculation_notes: Applied 1.30 multiplier for foreign income reporting. Added fees for Schedule D ($75) and Schedule E for 3 properties ($300). Time charge calculated as (3.5 hours * $125/hour * 1.30) - $175 base fee.
